meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>official</kanji> <kanji>method</kanji> of doing anything requires hiring a <vocabulary>lawyer</vocabulary>. They have to be there when you sign forms or sue people, or it isn't official at all.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
